description: A pair of improvised arm guards made from broken pieces of a plank that are tied to your arms with rags and string.  They offer good protection, but are really uncomfortable to wear.
Small squares of carpet rolled around your upper and lower arms.  Armor of the truly desperate or crafty.
//: The weight assumes four squares of carpet of about 25cm x 20cm.

description: Small squares of carpet rolled around your lower arms.  The bare minimum to hopefully stop a bite or two.
//: The weight assumes two squares of carpet of about 25cm x 20cm.

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.

name.str: pair of biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle.

name.str: pair of biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of biosilicified chitin arm guards

name.str: pair of biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: The sleeves of a thick cotton shirt, with a bunch of cloth sewn in to act as extra padding.  They're quite lonely, no longer being attached to each other by the rest of the shirt.
A pair of neoprene arm sleeves covered with molded plastic sheaths.
A pair of tough leather arm guards.  Light and comfortable.
A full assembly of medieval arm protection.  Rerebraces, couters, and vambraces, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.

name.str: pair of sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal, avoiding joints.  Perfect for the Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.
//: The weight assumes four sheets of about 25cm x 20cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened steel sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened steel sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from sheet metal, hardened for extra protection.  Still manages that Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.

name.str: pair of mild steel sheet metal bracers
name.str_pl: pairs of mild steel sheet metal bracers

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal, only covering your forearms.
//: The weight assumes two sheets of about 25cm x 20cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened steel sheet metal bracers
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened steel sheet metal bracers

description: A pair of forearm guards hammered out from sheet metal, hardened for extra protection.

name.str: pair of mild steel sheet metal pauldrons
name.str_pl: pairs of mild steel sheet metal pauldrons

description: Two half-cylinders of sheet metal jutting out over your shoulders and two more underneath.  They make it impossible to raise your arms fully, but they'll keep your arms attached to you.
//: The weight assumes four sheets of about 15cm x 15cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal pauldrons
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal pauldrons

description: A pair of crude pauldrons made out of sheet metal and hardened for reinforcement.

name.str: pair of mild steel sheet metal elbow guards
name.str_pl: pairs of mild steel sheet metal elbow guards

description: Two small half-cylinders of sheet metal cut down and hammered to fit over your elbows.  Very brutal, just needs spikes.
//: The weight assumes two sheets of about 15cm x 15cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal elbow guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal elbow guards

description: Elbow guards of sheet metal, hardened to make sure you never bang your funny bone on the table again.

name.str: pair of sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal arm guards

name.str: pair of sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal arm guards

description: Arm guards made of stacked paper sheets held together with duct tape.

name.str: pair of improvised tire arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of improvised tire arm guards

description: Arm guards made of thick chunks of tire held together with duct tape.
A pair of arm guards made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings.
A pair of arm guards made from thick chunks of tire secured by simple strings; the loose collection of rubber plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.
A pair of soft neoprene arm sleeves.  Often used in contact sports.
A pair of arm sleeves made from heavy quilted fabric.
A pair arm sleeves made from aramid, with strips of soft body armor sewn on top to simulate quilting.

description: Customized chainmail arm protection.  Both sleeves have straps to connect them with each other.  They don't cover the hands, making them less cumbersome and allowing them to be worn with gloves.

pocket_data.description: You can wear some armor over chainmail without penalty.
You can wear some armor over chainmail without penalty.

You can wear some armor over chainmail without penalty.

description: Customized chainmail arm protection.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion.  Both sleeves have straps to connect them with each other.  They don't cover the hands, making them less cumbersome and allowing them to be worn with gloves.

description: A pair of elbow pads made of stout plastic and cloth.
A pair of bronze arm guards with a simple leather lining.
A pair of light leather arm guards, made for archery.
A long pair of cut-resistant Kevlar sleeves with thumbholes.  Useful for chainsaw protection.
A light armguard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  This one has been made with mild steel.
A light armguard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with tougher medium steel, this offers solid protection.
A light armguard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with high steel offering excellent protection.
A light armguard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  The mild steel has been hardened, offering superior protection.
A light armguard, 1.25 mm at the thickest.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
An armguard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  This one has been made with mild steel.
An armguard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  Made with tougher medium steel, this offers solid protection.
An armguard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  Made with high steel offering excellent protection.
An armguard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  The mild steel has been hardened, offering superior protection.
An armguard, 1.75 mm at the thickest.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
A heavy armguard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  This one has been made with mild steel.
A heavy armguard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with tougher medium steel, this offers solid protection.
A heavy armguard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  Made with high steel offering excellent protection.
A heavy armguard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  The mild steel has been hardened, offering superior protection.
A heavy armguard, 2.25 mm at the thickest.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
Armor made of combined pre-Cataclysm clothing.  Sections from leather clothing are tightened and affixed to the sleeves of a thick cotton shirt, excluding the joints.
Hard arm guards used by riot police.
